item.title: CVE-2024-35640|2024-06-03T07:16:26.541Z -- Tomas Cordero -- Safety Exit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Tomas Cordero Safety Exit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Safety Exit: from n/a through 1.7.0.
